name: Stir Fry Vegetable
instructions: Cut the zucchini into long thin strips and cut into strips 1 to 1 1/2‚Äù long.
For onion, cut like making onion rings and quarter those slices.
Put 2 Tbsp of oil in a pan.
Add 2 Tbsp soy sauce, 1 Tbsp butter, dash salt and pepper.
Cook a minute or two and serve.
